sentences.sentence: We cannot allow dogmatism to stand in the way of progress.
sentences.translation: 我们不能让教条主义阻碍前进的步伐。

sentences.sentence: Students in the laughter of the dogmatism of knowledge.
sentences.translation: 学生在笑声中认识了教条主义的危害。

sentences.sentence: Their logomachy was far more stimulating to his intellect than the reserved and quiet dogmatism of Mr. Morse.
sentences.translation: 他们的唇枪舌剑要比莫尔斯先生们沉着冷静的教条更刺激起他的思考。
